title: They keep making warding a more team oriented thing
body: And the more they do the less impact my vision has on the game. That's not a bad thing, but when it's like "Well, we need vision here here and here and I've already got 3 wards placed down and once again 2 members on my team have 2 stacks of their warding totem and won't ever use them" it's just irritating. It's like, no matter what my team refuses to ward. Junglers never get tracking knife or sighstone and people that have warding totem's never use them.
